title: Passwordless Authentication Rollout
description: An analyst is rolling out passwordless authentication (e.g., using FIDO2 security keys) to a pilot group of users.

tasks.description: Configure the SSO provider to allow FIDO2 keys as an authentication method.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully enables the new authentication method.

tasks.description: Distribute FIDO2 security keys to the pilot group of users.
tasks.expected_outcome: All pilot users receive their hardware keys.

tasks.description: Guide the pilot users through the process of enrolling their security key with their account.
tasks.expected_outcome: All pilot users successfully enroll their keys and can log in without a password.
